DECLARE @year INT, @month INT SET @year = YEAR(GETDATE()) SET @month = MONTH(GETDATE())
SELECT *, CASE [repeat] WHEN 0 THEN dueDate WHEN 1 THEN DATEADD(year, @year-1900, CONVERT(date, DATEADD(month, @month-1, DAY(dueDate)-1))) WHEN 2 THEN DATEADD(year, @year-1900, CONVERT(date, DATEADD(month, MONTH(dueDate)-1, DAY(dueDate)-1))) END dueDate2 FROM [Todo] WHERE id = #{id}

DECLARE @year INT, @month INT, @userId INT SET @year = YEAR(GETDATE()) SET @month = MONTH(GETDATE()) SET @userId = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, DATEADD(day, -alertBefore, dueDate2) alertDate FROM ( SELECT t.*, u.name userName, CASE [repeat] WHEN 0 THEN dueDate WHEN 1 THEN DATEADD(year, @year-1900, CONVERT(date, DATEADD(month, @month-1, DAY(dueDate)-1))) WHEN 2 THEN DATEADD(year, @year-1900, CONVERT(date, DATEADD(month, MONTH(dueDate)-1, DAY(dueDate)-1))) END dueDate2 FROM Todo t LEFT JOIN [User] u ON t.userId = u.id WHERE userId = @userId ) t0 ) t1 WHERE alertDate <= GETDATE() AND (confirmDate IS NULL OR alertDate > confirmDate) ORDER BY dueDate2
mapper.insert: INSERT [Todo] (userId, createDate, dueDate, message) VALUES (#{userId}, GETDATE(), #{dueDate2}, #{message})
mapper.update: UPDATE [Todo] SET confirmDate = GETDATE() WHERE id = #{id}
